entry.source: {F812}Girl\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,86003}I haven't seen you before. Where are{F801}you from?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Girl\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,86003}I haven't seen you before. Where are{F801}you from?{F801}

entry.source: "The surface."{F801}Remain silent{F801}
entry.target: "The surface."{F801}Remain silent{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Girl\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,86004}The surface? You mean the place on{F801}the top of the ceiling?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,86005}Ooh, are you the "angels" people are{F801}talking about?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Girl\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,86004}The surface? You mean the place on{F801}the top of the ceiling?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,86005}Ooh, are you the "angels" people are{F801}talking about?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,86007}So we are gaining some infamy in{F801}Tokyo after all...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,86007}So we are gaining some infamy in{F801}Tokyo after all...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Girl\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,86008}So are you guys those "angels" people{F801}are talking about?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Girl\0{F87A,20}{F813,0,86008}So are you guys those "angels" people{F801}are talking about?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,1,1,1}{F813,0,86009}If people are gossiping about us in{F801}this foreign land, our infamy is{F801}indeed spreading...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,1,1,1}{F813,0,86009}If people are gossiping about us in{F801}this foreign land, our infamy is{F801}indeed spreading...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The girl walked closer to you.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The girl walked closer to you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F87B,20,1,1,1}{F813,0,86014}And I'm interested in you all.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F87B,20,1,1,1}{F813,0,86014}And I'm interested in you all.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,2,1,1}{F87B,4,11,1,1}{F813,0,86015}You are...? I suppose I am grateful{F801}for that.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,2,1,1}{F87B,4,11,1,1}{F813,0,86015}You are...? I suppose I am grateful{F801}for that.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F87B,20,4,1,1}{F813,0,86016}By the way, you're after the Black{F801}Samurai, huh?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F87B,20,4,1,1}{F813,0,86016}By the way, you're after the Black{F801}Samurai, huh?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F87B,20,1,1,1}{F813,0,86017}I don't know where she is, but I do{F801}know a place where there's a lot{F801}of books!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F87B,20,1,1,1}{F813,0,86017}I don't know where she is, but I do{F801}know a place where there's a lot{F801}of books!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F87B,20,4,1,1}{F813,0,86019}It's the Juraku Bookstore in the city{F801}called Ikebukuro.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F87B,20,4,1,1}{F813,0,86019}It's the Juraku Bookstore in the city{F801}called Ikebukuro.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,86020}This seems like important evidence.{F801}I'll make a note of it in the quest.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,86020}This seems like important evidence.{F801}I'll make a note of it in the quest.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,1,1,1}{F813,0,86021}Tell me... why are you showing us such{F801}kindness when we've only just met?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,1,1,1}{F813,0,86021}Tell me... why are you showing us such{F801}kindness when we've only just met?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F87B,20,4,1,1}{F813,0,86022}Didn't I tell you that already? I'm{F801}interested in you guys.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F87B,20,4,1,1}{F813,0,86022}Didn't I tell you that already? I'm{F801}interested in you guys.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Hikaru walked away.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Hikaru walked away.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,8,1,2}{F813,0,86025}...Clearly, she's the type to win{F801}men's favor. For myself, I cannot{F801}abide her like.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,8,1,2}{F813,0,86025}...Clearly, she's the type to win{F801}men's favor. For myself, I cannot{F801}abide her like.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,1,1,1}{F813,0,86026}There, there, Isabeau.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,1,1,1}{F813,0,86026}There, there, Isabeau.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F87B,3,8,1,1}{F813,0,86010}You are correct. We are, in fact,{F801}those same angels.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F87B,3,8,1,1}{F813,0,86010}You are correct. We are, in fact,{F801}those same angels.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,10,1,1}{F87B,4,1,1,1}{F813,0,86012}That having been established, who{F801}are you? Have you some business{F801}with us?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,10,1,1}{F87B,4,1,1,1}{F813,0,86012}That having been established, who{F801}are you? Have you some business{F801}with us?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F813,0,86027}She knew about the book aspect of our{F801}quarry, though. Has word of our search{F801}traveled so far already?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F813,0,86027}She knew about the book aspect of our{F801}quarry, though. Has word of our search{F801}traveled so far already?{F801}

entry.source: コー¿ス退治のクÉストを受注します{F801}
entry.target: コー¿ス退治のクÉストを受注します{F801}
